plot outline: Vinod who works as a benign marketing executive in a mall, is surprised by a girl who proposes to him & then disappears. She continues to give him the run-around & takes a while before relenting and appearing before him. When Vinod proposes to her she throws him a challenge to be a man & beat an Olympic Silver Medalist Boxer.
title: Valiyavan
plot: Viond, who is madly in love with Subiksha, is challenged by her that he fight and win Ashwin, a boxing champion. He accepts her challenge to not only prove his love but also settle an old score.
